mapper.sql:
select notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_registerdate from board_notice
notice_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
notice_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
to_char(notice_registerdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{start_date} and #{end_date}
mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, to_char(notice_registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as notice_registerdate from board_notice where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.insert:
select BOARD_NOTICE_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into board_notice(notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, admin_no) values(#{notice_no}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{admin_no})
mapper.update: update board_notice set notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, notice_registerdate = sysdate where notice_no = #{notice_no}
